name: n8n-nodes-base.getResponseTrigger
description: Starts the workflow when GetResponse events occur

options.name: Customer Subscribed
options.description: Receive notifications when a customer is subscribed to a list

options.name: Customer Unsubscribed
options.description: Receive notifications when a customer is unsubscribed from a list

options.name: Email Clicked
options.description: Receive notifications when a email is clicked

options.name: Email Opened
options.description: Receive notifications when a email is opened

options.name: Survey Submitted
options.description: Receive notifications when a survey is submitted

properties.name: listIds
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

options.name: delete
options.description: Whether to delete the current subscription
